value:
The battlefield is no place to show
off—the point is to keep your head
and survive.

I lost my temper with Takumi once,
attempting to explain that losing him
would break us...would break...me.

Lavish titles are embarrassing... I'd
prefer you treat me no different than
any other warrior in your retinue.

The food in this castle is incredible.
Soybeans used to replace meat?
I'm sure even Sakura would love it...

Ryoma told me you must always keep
your future in mind, and I find myself
wanting to tell you the same now.

I see... So, this is your castle then.
To tell the truth, it has a similar feel
to $Nf's castle.

Nothing can scare me anymore.
Now, don't let up—victory is near!

Things may be going well now, but
I won't just rest on my laurels.

Are you here to watch me fight?
Well, I've done better, but this will
do—for the moment.

With this, I'll be able to do even
more for you. I look forward to
being able to put it to use!

Being called on as a Hero is certainly
an honor—it's my chance to show off
the might of Hoshidan kinshi knights!

Do you happen to notice anything
different about me? Any scent you
may not have noticed before?$k$p...Nothing? Maybe try getting a little
bit closer... Take a sniff.$k$pSmells good, right? It's a fragrance
crafted by the artisan perfumers
of Hoshido.$k$pPerfumes aren't usually an interest
of mine, but I know there is a certain
image we royals must keep up.$k$pRyoma once told me I could stand
to behave more properly, and I'm
trying to take that to heart, so...$k$pI tried my best to remember how
to apply perfume, but I may have
forgotten the finer details.$k$pBut now I want to try on different
perfumes every day until I can find
the perfect scent for me!$k$pAny help you can offer along the way
would be appreciated... I will follow
your nose, $Nu!
For Hoshido!
At any cost!
Out of my way!
Prepared yourself?
Not now...
I'm a Legendary Hero? Might be a stretch, but I'll take it.
Ah! Uhh... What is it? Oh. We're not children. Show some restraint.
It is an honor to be called Legendary Hero. Though I don't deserve the title, I will do my best to live up to it.
I guess following my own path paid off.
I'm feeling restless... Do you have time to talk?
I'm sure Azama and Setsuna will have plenty to say about this...
I intend to become a Hero who can support you, no matter what may happen.
Got it.
Orders. Quickly!
I don't back down!
